actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1991, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends Public Law 101-412 (continuing appropriations for FY 1991) to extend the effective date of the presidential sequestration order pursuant to the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act) and the temporary increase in the public debt from October 19, 1990, until October 23, 1990.

titles.title: Making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1991, and for other purposes.
